product_name: REI Camp Dome 6 Footprint - Special Buy
long_description: Used underneath your REI Camp Dome 6 tent, this nylon tarp extends the tent's life by protecting the floor. Sizing specific to the tent prevents water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment. Special buy.
short_description: Used underneath your REI Camp Dome 6 tent, this nylon tarp extends the tent's life by protecting the floor.
